auth.name: Name
auth.enterEmailPassword: Enter your email and password to sign in.
auth.enterDetails: Enter your details to register. You will be logged in after registration.
auth.promoDescription: Create an account to quickly find jobs perfectly matched to you.
auth.promoCtaLogin: I already have an account – log in
auth.promoBarText: Do you have or want to create an Updoo account?
auth.mustAcceptTerms: You must accept the terms and privacy policy.
auth.termsLabel: I accept the Terms and Privacy Policy

profile.editProfileDesc: Change your name, surname, email address or password. After changing password you will be logged out.
profile.passwordMinLength: Min. 6 characters. After changing password you will be logged out.
profile.passwordBothRequired: Enter the new password in both fields.
profile.defaultMessageDesc: Welcome message with portfolio links. You can personalize it during each submission.
profile.defaultMessagePlaceholder:
Hello! I'm interested in this offer. Here are links to my portfolio:

- Portfolio: https://example.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/username

I'm happy to answer any questions!

onboarding.enterNameSurname: Your data will not be publicly visible. Under the application, only your first name and the first letter of your surname will be visible.
onboarding.chooseAccountTypeDesc: Choose whether you are a client looking for a freelancer or a freelancer looking for work.
onboarding.clientDesc: I'm looking for a freelancer to complete a project
onboarding.freelancerDesc: I'm looking for projects to complete
onboarding.freelancerSkillsDesc: Select the skills you have so we can better match you with jobs.
onboarding.freelancerDefaultMessageDesc: Create a welcome message with portfolio links. You can personalize it during each submission.
onboarding.freelancerDefaultMessagePlaceholder:
Hello! I'm interested in this offer. Here are links to my portfolio:

- Portfolio: https://example.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/username

I'm happy to answer any questions!
onboarding.freelancerDefaultMessageHint: You can change this message later in profile settings.

jobs.headerSampleWithCategory: Check out a sample of the {count} {category} jobs posted on Updoo
jobs.headerSampleWithoutCategory: Check out a sample of the {count} jobs posted on Updoo
jobs.editJobDescription: After saving, the job will return to "Draft" status and will require re-approval by an administrator.
jobs.noJobs: No jobs. Add the first job!
jobs.noFavorites: You don't have any saved jobs yet. Click the star next to a job to add it to favorites.
jobs.waitingForAdmin: Waiting for administrator approval. Visible only to author.
jobs.title: Title
jobs.fillRequired: Fill in title, description and category
jobs.selectHoursPerWeek: For hourly billing, select hours per week
jobs.invalidOfferDays: Days to collect offers: choose 7, 14, 21 or 30 days
jobs.deadlinePassedMessage: Application deadline has passed. You can no longer apply.
jobs.applied: You have applied to this job.
jobs.author: Author

newJobForm.title: New job
newJobForm.description: Fill in the job details. Billing fields and skills will help match the offer.
newJobForm.skillsDescription: Select from list or type name and press Enter to add (including new skill).
newJobForm.offerDaysDescription: 7, 14, 21 or 30 days to collect offers from creation date.
newJobForm.suggestedRateNote: We've suggested a market rate, but you can change it
newJobForm.billingTypeFixedDescription: Fixed rate for the entire project regardless of working time

branding.logotypeTagline: Publish and search offers for freelancers

homepage.heroText: The easiest way to connect businesses and top freelancers
